The claim was originally published as an: s joke and has been around since at least 2014.
The International Astronomical Union: IAU) reclassified Pluto as a "dwarf planet" in 2006, not as a "major planet."
The article falsely attributed the IAU: s decision to confusion with the Disney character Pluto, when in reality, the IAU downgraded Pluto because it did not meet the criteria for recognition as a planet.
